description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Geraldton, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Boutique Geraldton Coastal Escape
hotels.description: Inhale the fresh coastal breeze on a relaxing escape to Western Australia's Coral Coast at the Gerald Apartment Hotel, a stylish boutique retreat overlooking the seaside city of Geraldton. Right in the heart of the CBD, this luxe hotel - stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 award - features tastefully designed rooms enriched with splashes of colour from curated artwork and is crowned with a rooftop bar with sensational views and a deluxe menu of hand-crafted drinks and chef-prepared street food. Take a two-minute stroll to the seafront esplanade and beach, embark on an adventure to the Abrolhos Islands, or splash out at one of the many nearby restaurants serving Australia's prized rock lobster

hotels.title: Central Geraldton Self-Contained Apartment Escape on Batavia Coast Marina with Pool & BBQ Facilities
hotels.description: Experience the coastal charm of Western Australia with a cosy apartment stay in the heart of Geraldton. This contemporary retreat is ideally located moments from the Batavia Coast Marina and boardwalk, with easy access to the region's pristine beaches, historic sites and vibrant dining scene. Explore the captivating HMAS Sydney II Memorial, visit the Geraldton Regional Art Gallery, or savour fresh seafood at local eateries. The resort's spacious apartments offer everything you need for a comfortable vacation. Be sure to take advantage of the onsite barbecue area, the heated pool or the spa to unwind after a day of exploring the surrounding area.

seo.title: Hotel a Geraldton - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Geraldton, Australia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
